title: **3bdrm 2 bth available NOW perfect LOCATION $$$**
map_address: 2614 N Wilton Ave near Lincoln, Wrightwood, Sheffield st
posting_body: Newly Refreshed - enjoy two levels of living in this all brick, duplex up unit.
Explore the wide open main floor living, dining, and kitchen areas.
Plus a fireplace, another living room, and soaring vaulted ceilings throughout the top floor.
The unit has storage galore including a coat closet, under the stairs storage, and large bedroom closets.
Best of all, one ATTACHED garage parking spot is included.
There is a large rear deck, plus a front balcony.
The unit is walking distance to Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Dom's Market, and many restaurants.
Schools include Alcott Elementary and Lincoln Park High School.
Lincoln Park, Lakeview, Red line, purple line, brown line, diversey stop, fullerton stop
